movies.title: Raped by an Angel 2: The Uniform Fan
movies.originalTitle: Keung gan 2: Chai fook yau wak
movies.plot: A dentist obsessed with young women in various uniforms stalks two sisters. The oldest sister is romantically pursued by a thug that was just released from prison. The dentist also has the hots for her and the two paths eventually cross.
movies.simplePlot: A dentist obsessed with young women in various uniforms stalks two sisters. The oldest sister is romantically pursued by a thug that was just released from prison. The dentist also has the ...

biography.bio: Francis Chun-Yu Ng was born on December 21, 1961 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and director, known for Exilé (2006), Infernal Affairs II (2003) and The mission (1999). He has been married to Fiona Wong Lai-Ping since December 2, 2002.
biography.name: Francis Chun-Yu Ng

biography.bio: Athena Chu was born on October 25, 1971 in Hong Kong as Chu Yan. She is an actress, known for Le roi singe 2 - Cendrillon (1995), Whispers and Moans (2007) and Chinese Odyssey 2002 (2002). She has been married to Goon Chung Wong since 2012. They have one child.
biography.name: Athena Chu

biography.bio: Jane Chung is an actress, known for Raped by an Angel 2: The Uniform Fan (1998), The Incredible Hulk (1978) and Sister, Sister (1994).
biography.name: Jane Chung

biography.bio: Joe Tak-Chung Ma was born on June 27, 1968 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for A True Mob Story (1998), Raped by an Angel 2: The Uniform Fan (1998) and Sao gen zhuang nan (2000). He has been married to Karen Cheung since 1993. They have one child.
biography.name: Joe Tak-Chung Ma

biography.bio: Fan Yeung is an actress, known for Chinese Torture Chamber Story 2 (1998), Raped by an Angel 2: The Uniform Fan (1998) and The Deadly Camp (1999).
biography.name: Fan Yeung

biography.bio: Po Chun Chan is an actor and assistant director, known for Ip Man (2008), Ip Man 2 (2010) and Flashpoint (2007).
biography.name: Po Chun Chan

biography.bio: Aman Chang is a director and actor, known for Yuen chi mo hei (1999), Hua gu long yu qian nian chong (1999) and Raped by an Angel 2: The Uniform Fan (1998).
biography.name: Aman Chang

biography.bio: Ping Ha was born on October 6, 1937 in Hong Kong, China. She is an actress, known for Espion amateur (2001), Summer Snow (1995) and Flashpoint (2007).
biography.name: Ping Ha

biography.bio: Foo-Keung Kong is known for his work on Painted Skin (2008), One Nite in Mongkok (2004) and Once Upon a Time in China V (1994).
biography.name: Foo-Keung Kong

biography.bio: Rocky Lai was born as Keung-Kun Lai. He is known for his work on Police Story 4: First Strike (1996), Rumble in the Bronx (1995) and Police Story (1985).
biography.name: Rocky Lai

biography.bio: Gong Lam is an actor, known for Fist of Legend (1994), The Return of the God of Gamblers (1994) and The Defender (1994).
biography.name: Gong Lam

biography.bio: Yee Mei is an actress, known for Raped by an Angel 2: The Uniform Fan (1998), To Live and Die in Tsimshatsui (1994) and Long hu Bo Lan ji (1996).
biography.name: Yee Mei

biography.bio: Ka-Wai Ng is an actor, known for Raped by an Angel 2: The Uniform Fan (1998).
biography.name: Ka-Wai Ng

biography.bio: Yin Tsang is an actress, known for Undercover Girls (1999), Mystery Files (1996) and Hui zhuan shou shi (1997).
biography.name: Yin Tsang

biography.bio: Ronald Wong is an actor and producer, known for As Tears Go By (1988), Sheng si xian (1985) and People's Hero (1987).
biography.name: Ronald Wong
